comment.body: After rebooting my Mac, the above “[Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/195865#issuecomment-2620511584)” is now happening in response to these 2 filters only when the add-on is enabled.  For some reason, it was happening for a while before when it was either on or off.  Either way, these shouldn’t be blocking legitimate related item links from loading on any site when clicked.  And it was only in recent months when it started happening, which is why I had to disable AG on Amazon.

issue.title: Fix #197510 aftermath.site

comment.body: If you check both https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/197510 and https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/196987, you will see that I made a pull request before they even assigned themselves, let alone created a rule. Yet both times, my pull request was ignored. I am always happy to improve my rules if there is a problem; however, I can't do that if they won't tell me what the problem is.

issue.title: Fix #197510 aftermath.site

comment.body:
> It's already on the filter list.

I have left it open while I wait for @Sergey-Lyapin to inform me why they did not like my rule. However, they then went ahead and created a new rule that vary closely resembles this one. This is now the second time they have done this.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: androidpolice.com & other sites that use adsninja.ca

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Android ### AdGuard version 4.8 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? other (specify in comment below) ### Which device do you use? Mobile ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.androidpolice.com/video/pixel-9-pro-vs-oneplus-13/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters AdGuard DNS filter ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots the filter ||adsninja.ca^ breaks the video player on this site and other sites. attached pic of the sites
Screenshot: ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a7d89537-559a-4a70-aa64-68773a6cff02)

### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: i think that the domain should be removed from dns tho since it affects alot of sites dont u? @zloyden

comment.body:
Текущее правило `habr.com##.tm-overlay` ломает в мобильном сайте все попапы, включая боковые меню и всплывающие меню. Вот вам и проверка. Сайт с текущим правилом не работает.

1. Включить мобильный дизайн в devtools
2. Нажать на гамбугерное меню слева 
3. Не вылезло -> заблокировано правилом.

Добавил `habr.com#@#.tm-overlay` как пользовательское и меню снова работают.

pull_request.title: Fix #197532 hexclad.com
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

#197532 

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met
